column2: You and [From.GetBestName] face off against each other. What will you do?
[FromFrom.GetBestName] has surrendered and is at your mercy. What will you do?
Despite your surrender, [FromFrom.GetBestName] decides to kill you anyway.
Accepting your surrender, [FromFrom.GetBestName] decides to capture and imprison you.
Saying you fought well, [FromFrom.GetBestName] tells you that you are free to go.
You flee the site of battle, leaving your opponent behind.
[FromFrom.GetBestName] has fled from battle like a true coward!
You have gained the upper hand and have the first blow!
[FromFrom.GetBestName] has gained the upper hand and has the first blow!
[FromFrom.GetBestName] is maneuvring for agile, precise attacks.
You tried to flee, but [FromFrom.GetBestName] managed to prevent that.
